extension.summary: Send commands over HTTP on Play, Pause, Resume, Stop
extension.description: Add-on to send simple plain-text commands over HTTP protocol, to control smart home appliances. Tested with http://www.inels.com Smart RF box eLAN-RF-003 in combinatino with switching socket RFSC-61. Developped for Kodi 17.0 (possibly works on older versions). Inspired by add-on http://kodi.wiki/view/Add-on:WeMo_Toggle For questions or suggestions please contact me at pavol.antalik@gmail.com
